name: sparky
title: Sparky
description: Live data binding templating library for the DOM.

scripts.build-nodeps: cat js/mount.js js/sparky.js js/sparky.fn.js js/sparky.fn.load.js js/sparky.fn.template.js js/sparky.fn.each.js js/sparky.transforms.js > dist/sparky-nodeps.js && minify dist/sparky-nodeps.js
scripts.build: npm run build-nodeps && cat fn/js/fn.js fn/js/stream.js fn/js/observable.js fn/js/stream.observe.js fn/js/time.js dom/js/dom.js dom/polyfills/customevent.js dom/polyfills/document.scrollingelement.js dom/dist/dom-nodeps.js dist/sparky-nodeps.js > dist/sparky.js && minify dist/sparky.js && cat dom/css/dom.css css/sparky.css > dist/sparky.css
scripts.build-version: npm run build && cp dist/sparky.js dist/sparky-2.2.2.js && cp dist/sparky.min.js dist/sparky-2.2.2.min.js && cp dist/sparky.css dist/sparky-2.2.2.css
